title: AI Assisted Next Gen Outdoor Optical Networks: Camera Sensing for Monitoring and User Localization
summary: We consider outdoor optical access points (OAPs), which, enabled by recent advances in metasurface technology, have attracted growing interest. While OAPs promise high data rates and strong physical-layer security, practical deployments still expose vulnerabilities and misuse patterns that necessitate a dedicated monitoring layer - the focus of this work.
